Method Detail

empiricalStateFrequencies

public static double[] empiricalStateFrequencies(PatternList patternList)
Returns a double array containing the empirically estimated frequencies for the states of patternList. This currently calls the version that maps to PAUP's estimates.

Parameters:
patternList - the pattern list to calculate the empirical state frequencies from
Returns:
the empirical state frequencies of the given pattern list

empiricalStateFrequenciesPAUP

public static double[] empiricalStateFrequenciesPAUP(PatternList patternList)
Returns a double array containing the empirically estimated frequencies for the states of patternList. This version of the routine should match the values produced by PAUP.

Parameters:
patternList - the pattern list to calculate the empirical state frequencies from
Returns:
the empirical state frequencies of the given pattern list

empiricalStateFrequenciesMrBayes

public static double[] empiricalStateFrequenciesMrBayes(PatternList patternList)
Returns a double array containing the empirically estimated frequencies for the states of patternList. This version of the routine should match the values produced by MrBayes.

Parameters:
patternList - the pattern list to calculate the empirical state frequencies from
Returns:
the empirical state frequencies of the given pattern list

equalStateFrequencies

public static double[] equalStateFrequencies(PatternList patternList)
Returns a double array containing the equal frequencies for the states of patternList.

Parameters:
patternList - the pattern list
Returns:
return equal state frequencies based on the data type of the patternlist
